Text:
Hi Sky,

Thanks for the Surfaris. 

Excellent stereo sound on this cd.

And thanks for the FLAC files.

Beatle Tom
I like it that you like it beatle Tom
FYI: It would appear the record company screwed up; track 23 is the same as track 14(Baja). "Blue Surf" is in fact missing. Otherwise a great cd....excellent sound!  Many tnx!!
